SourceText: Your data is important to us. This @global.privacy_policy for @global.app_id (‘@global.app_name’ or ‘the app’) sets out our policies for the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information in the use of @global.app_name.
text: Data yako ni muhimu kwetu. Hii @global.privacy_policy kwa @global.app_id (‘@global.app_name’ ‘au programu’) huweka bayana sera zetu za ukusanyaji, matumizi na ufichuaji wa taarifa binafsi katika matumizi ya @global.app_name.

SourceText: Please read this @global.privacy_policy carefully. By downloading or using the app, you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this @global.privacy_policy.
text: Tafadhali soma hii @global.privacy_policy kwa umakini. Kwa kupakua au kutumia programu tumishi hii, unakubali ukusanyaji na matumizi ya taarifa kuhusiana na sera hii. Hatutatumia au kushirikisha taarifa zako na mtu yeyote isipokuwa kama ilivyoelezwa katika sera hii ya @global.privacy_policy.

SourceText: The terms used in this @global.privacy_policy have the same meanings as in our @global.terms_and_conditions, which are accessible within the app, unless otherwise defined in this @global.privacy_policy.
text: Masharti yanayotumika katika @global.privacy_policy yana maana sawa na yaliyopo katika @global.terms_and_conditions zetu, ambazo zinaweza kufikiwa ndani ya programu tumishi, isipokuwa kama imefafanuliwa vinginevyo katika @global.privacy_policy.

SourceText: 1. What information does the app collect about you and how do we use it?
text: 1. Programu tumishi inakusanya taarifa gani kukuhusu na tunaitumiaje taarifa hiyo?

SourceText: Personal Data
text: Data Binafsi

SourceText: For the purpose of this @global.privacy_policy, “personal data” means any information that enables us to identify an individual, directly or indirectly, by reference to an identifier such as email, name, @global.app_name identification number, location data, or one or more factors specific to the individual.
text: Kwa madhumuni ya @global.privacy_policy, "data binafsi" inamaanisha maelezo yoyote yanayotuwezesha kumtambua mtu, moja kwa moja au isivyo moja kwa moja, kwa kurejelea utambulisho kama vile barua pepe, jina, nambari ya utambulisho ya @global.app_name, taarifa ya eneo, au sababu moja au zaidi maalum kwa mtu binafsi. Tunapotumia programu tumishi yetu, tunaweza kukuhitaji utupe taarifa nyingine zinazoweza kukutambulisha.

SourceText: Specifically, this is data regarding gender.  All data collected is linked to your unique @global.app_name identification number.  The @global.app_name identification number produced within the app may also be used to link with any out of app surveys conducted.
text: Hasa, hizi ni taarifa zinazohusu jinsia. Taarifa zote zilizokusanywa zitaunganishwa na namba yako ya kipekee ya utambulisho @global.app_name. namba yako ya utambulisho ya @global.app_name itatolewa kupitia programu tumishi, pia itatumika kuunganisha na tafiti nyingine zitakazo fanyika nnje ya programu tumishi.

SourceText: We process your data to provide parenting support to you, communicate when you contact us, for security reasons as well as research purposes (see section ‘Information Sharing’). The primary research purpose includes optimising engagement of a digital parenting intervention (use of @global.app_name) to prevent violence against adolescents. During the course of research, the study team may use aggregated and anonymised data from the app for further research projects. Finally, please note that we may process your data without your knowledge or consent, where this is required or permitted by law.
text: Tunachakata taarifa zako ili kukupa usaidizi wa malezi, unapowasiliana nasi, kwa sababu za usalama na pia madhumuni ya utafiti (angalia sehemu ya ‘Kushirikishana Taarifa’). Madhumuni ya kimsingi ya utafiti ni pamoja na kuboresha ushiriki katika malezi kwa njia ya kidijitali (matumizi ya @global.app_name) ili kuzuia unyanyasaji dhidi ya vijana. Wakati wa utafiti, timu ya utafiti inaweza kutumia taarifa zilizojumlishwa na zisizokuwa na utambulisho kutoka katika programu tumishi kwa miradi zaidi ya utafiti. Hatimaye, tafadhali kumbuka kwamba tunaweza kuchakata taarifa yako bila ujuzi au idhini yako, ambapo hii inahitajika au inaruhusiwa na sheria.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: The processing of your personal data is primarily based on:
text: Uchakataji wa taarifa yako ya kibinafsi kimsingi hutegemea:

SourceText: The @global.app_name team has legitimate interests in carrying out research activities, under Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR, regarding the sharing of limited details related to how you use the app; and
text: Timu ya @global.app_name ina maslahi halali katika kutekeleza shughuli za utafiti, chini ya Sanaa. 6(1)(f) GDPR, kuhusiana na kushirikisha maelezo machache yanayohusiana na jinsi unavyotumia programu tumishi; na
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Your consent, under Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR, regarding the sharing of answers you may provide to in-app questions (those involving as stated gender and again entirely optional).
text: Ridhaa yako, chini ya ibara. 6(1)(a) GDPR, kuhusu kushiriki majibu unaweza kutoa kwa maswali ya ndani ya programu (yale yanayohusu jinsia iliyobainishwa na tena ya hiari).

SourceText: Log Data
text: Data ya Kumbukumbu

SourceText: Whenever you use our app, we collect data and information (through third party services) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data includes information such as a truncated device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilising our app, the time, date and your intentions within the app (which include but are not limited to any app buttons clicked or pages visited.)
text: Wakati wowote unapotumia programu yetu, tunakusanya taarifa  (kupitia huduma za watu wengine) kupitia simu yako.Taarifa hii ya Kumbukumbu inajumuisha maelezo kama vile anuani ya Itifaki ya Mtandao ya kifaa ("IP"), jina la kifaa, toleo la mfumo wa uendeshaji, usanidi wa programu tumishi unapotumia programu tumishi yetu, saa, tarehe na asili ya matumizi yako ya programu tumishi.)

SourceText: Cookies
text: Vidakuzi

SourceText: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
text: Vidakuzi ni faili zilizo na kiasi kidogo cha data ambazo hutumiwa kama vitambulishi vya kipekee visivyojulikana. Hizi hutumiwa kwa kivinjari chako kutoka kwa tovuti unazotembelea na kuhifadhiwa kwenye kumbukumbu ya ndani ya kifaa chako.

SourceText: This app does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. In particular, the app integrates GlitchTip and Matomo analytics as well as Firebase authentication software.
text: Programu tumishi hii haitumii "vidakuzi" hivi kwa uwazi. Hata hivyo, programu tumishi hii inaweza kutumia msimbo wa watu wengine na maktaba zinazotumia "vidakuzi" kukusanya maelezo na kuboresha huduma zao. Haswa, programu tumishi inaunganisha uchanganuzi wa GlitchTip na Matomo vilevile programu ya uthibitishaji wa kanzidata.

SourceText: Legal
text: Kisheria

SourceText: The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this @global.privacy_policy.
text: Taarifa tunazoomba tutazihifadhi na kuzitumia kama ilivyoelezwa katika @global.privacy_policy.
note: The string @global.privacy_policy should not be translated.

SourceText: Feedback Submissions
text: Mawasilisho ya Maoni

SourceText: Your feedback on the app is important to us. We shall always anonymise your personal information when sharing and publishing your feedback verbatim more broadly.
text: Maoni yako kuhusu programu tumishi hii ni muhimu kwetu. Daima tutaficha maelezo yako ya binafsi tunaposhirikishana na kuchapisha maoni yako kwa upana zaidi.

SourceText: Aggregate Data
text: Taarifa ya Jumla

SourceText: Your data is important to the @global.app_name team for broader research purposes. Aggregate data is always anonymised.
text: Taarifa yako ni muhimu kwa timu ya @global.app_name kwa madhumuni mapana ya utafiti. Taarifa kwa jumla daima hazitatambulika.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Push notifications
text: Taarifa za kushinikiza

SourceText: You may opt out of push notifications which will be set up to inform you of certain account features or other notifications.
text: Unaweza kuchagua kutopokea taarifa za ukumbusho ambazo zitawekwa kukujulisha kuhusu vipengele fulani vya akaunti au arifa nyingine.

SourceText: 2. Information Sharing
text: 2. Kupeana Taarifa

SourceText: Limited internal staff to IDEMS may have access to personal data collected via the app as well as log data, as necessary to perform their duties regarding the operation of the app. These data will only be accessed on a need-to-know basis, and all team members with access to the data are bound to confidentiality.
text: Wafanyakazi wachache wa ndani wa IDEMS wanaweza kufikia taarifa binafsi iliyokusanywa kupitia programu tumishi, inapohitajika ili kutekeleza majukumu yao kuhusu uendeshaji wa programu. Taarifa hizi zitafikiwa tu kwa msingi wa kuhitaji kujua, na timu nzima inayoweza kufikia taarifa hizo wanalazimika kuwa na siri.

SourceText: You agree that your personal information may be shared with third parties such as researchers and partners involved in the improvement or implementation of the app including those outside your country. Prior to the disclosure of information with research partners we will make anonymous to the extent possible and where appropriate information such as chosen username and email address (where collected). In reading and accepting this @global.privacy_policy, you permit us to use your anonymized data in published research.
text: Unakubali kwamba maelezo yako ya kibinafsi yanaweza kushirikiwa na washirika wengine kama vile watafiti na wabia wanaohusika katika uboreshaji au utekelezaji wa programu tumishi ikiwa ni pamoja na wale walio nje ya nchi yako. Kabla ya kufichuliwa kwa habari na wabia wa utafiti, tutafanya bila utambulisho kwa kadiri tuwezavyo na inapofaa taarifa kama vile jina la mtumiaji lilochaguliwa na anwani ya barua pepe (zikikusanywa). Katika kusoma na kukubali hii @global.privacy_policy, unaturuhusu kutumia data yako isiyojulikana katika utafiti uliochapishwa.
note: The string @global.privacy_policy should not be translated.

SourceText: You agree that we may transfer your personal information outside your country, for example, to administer cloud services. We will ensure that any country, company or person that we pass your personal information to agrees to treat your information with the same level of protection as we are obliged to.
text: Unakubali kwamba tunaweza kuhamisha taarifa yako binafsi nje ya nchi yako, kwa mfano, ili kusimamia huduma za uhifadhi mtandaoni. Tutahakikisha kwamba nchi, kampuni yooyote au mtu yeyote ambaye tunampatia taarifa zako za binafsi anakubali kushughulikia maelezo yako kwa kiwango sawa cha ulinzi tunachowajibika.

SourceText: 3. Third Party Service Providers and Websites
text: 3. Watoa Huduma na Tovuti za Wahusika wengine

SourceText:
The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you. We do so for the following reasons:
* To facilitate our app
* To provide the app on our behalf
* To perform app-related services; or
* To assist us in analysing how our app is used.
text:
Programu tumishi hii haitumii huduma za watu wengine ambazo zinaweza kukusanya taarifa zinazotumiwa kukutambulisha. Tunafanya hivyo kwa sababu zifuatazo:
* Ili kuwezesha programu tumishi yetu
* Ili kutoa programu tumishi kwa niaba yetu
* Kufanya huduma zinazohusiana na programu tumishi; au
* Ili kutusaidia katika kuchanganua jinsi programu tumishi yetu inatumiwa.

SourceText: We want to inform users of this app that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
text: Tunataka kuwafahamisha watumiaji wa programu hii kwamba wahusika hawa wengine wanaweza kufikia Taarifa zako za Binafsi. Sababu ni kufanya kazi walizopewa kwa niaba yetu. Walakini, wanalazimika kutofichua au kutumia habari kwa madhumuni mengine yoyote.

SourceText: Links to the privacy policies of third-party service providers used by the app:
text: Njia za kufikia sera za faragha za watoa huduma wengine zinazotumiwa na programu tumishi hii:

SourceText: GlitchTip
text: GlitchTip

SourceText: This app may contain links to other sites that are not covered by this @global.privacy_policy. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. This @global.privacy_policy applies only to the processing of your information by this app. It does not address, and we are not responsible for, the privacy, information, or other practices of any third parties, including any third party operating any site or service to which this app links to.
text: Programu tumishi hii inaweza kuwa na viungo vya tovuti zingine ambazo hazijashughulikiwa na @global.privacy_policy. Ukibofya kiungo cha mtu wa tatu, utaelekezwa kwenye tovuti hiyo. Hii @global.privacy_policy inatumika tu kwa uchakataji wa maelezo yako na programu tumishi hii. Haishughulikii, na hatuwajibikii, faragha, taarifa, au desturi nyingine za wahusika wengine, ikiwa ni pamoja na wahusika wengine wanaoendesha tovuti au huduma yoyote ambayo programu tumishi hii inaunganisha nayo.

SourceText: 4. How long do we keep your data?
text: 4. Je, tunahifadhi data yako kwa muda gani?

SourceText: We will only retain your personal information for as long as we need it to fulfil our purposes, including any relating to app services as well as legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
text: Tutahifadhi maelezo yako ya kibinafsi kwa muda ambao tutayahitaji ili kutimiza madhumuni yetu, ikiwa ni pamoja na yoyote yanayohusiana na huduma za programu pamoja na mahitaji ya kisheria, uhasibu au kuripoti.

SourceText: 5. How do we keep your data secure?
text: 5. Je, tunawekaje data yako salama?

SourceText: We value your trust in providing us your personal information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.  We also reserve the right to the storage of your data on third party servers or databases outside of the listed @global.app_name team (refer to the section on Third Party Service Providers and Websites).  Therefore usage of the app is at your own risk.
text: Tunathamini uaminifu wako kwa kutupa taarifa zako binafsi, kwa hivyo tunajitahidi kutumia njia zinazokubalika kibiashara kuzilinda. Lakini kumbuka kuwa hakuna njia ya uwasilishaji kupitia mtandao, au njia ya uhifadhi wa kielektroniki ambayo ni salama na ya kuaminika kwa 100%, na hatuwezi kuhakikisha usalama wake kamili. Pia tunahifadhi haki ya kutunza taarifa yako kwenye kanzidata za watu wengine au kuhifadhi taarifa  nje ya timu iliyoorodheshwa ya @global.parent_app. Kwa hivyo matumizi ya programu ni kwa taadhari yako mwenyewe.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: 6. Children’s Privacy
text: 6. Faragha ya Watoto

SourceText: This app is not targeted towards anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from individuals under 18. As per our Terms and Conditions, in the case we discover that an individual under 18 has accessed the app, we will immediately delete this data from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and are aware that your child has provided us with personal information (such as gender), please contact us so that we will be able to undertake the necessary actions.
text: Programu tumishi hii haijalenga mtu yeyote aliye na umri wa chini ya miaka 18. Hatukusanyi taarifa zinazoweza kumtambulisha mtu binafsi kutoka kwa watu walio chini ya umri wa miaka 18 kwa makusudi. Iwapo tutagundua kuwa mtu aliye na umri wa chini ya miaka 18 ametupa taarifa za binafsi, tutafuta taarifa hii mara moja kutoka kwa kanzidata zetu. Ikiwa wewe ni mzazi au mlezi na unafahamu kwamba mtoto wako ametupa taarifa binafsi, tafadhali wasiliana nasi ili tuweze kuchukua hatua zinazohitajika.

SourceText:
Under certain circumstances, by law you have the right to:
* Request access to your data (commonly known as a "subject access request"). This enables you to receive a copy of your data and to check that we are lawfully processing it.
* Request correction of your data. This enables you to ask us to correct any incomplete or inaccurate information we hold about you.
* Request erasure of your data. This enables you to ask us to delete or remove your data under certain circumstances, for example, if you consider that there is no good reason for us continuing to process it. You also have the right to ask us to delete or remove your data where you have exercised your right to object to processing (see below).
* Object to processing of your data where we are relying on our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and there is something about your particular situation which makes you want to object to processing on this ground.
* Request the restriction of processing of your data. This enables you to ask us to suspend the processing of your data, for example if you want us to establish its accuracy or the reason for processing it.
* Request the transfer of your data to another party.
text:
Chini ya hali fulani, kisheria una haki ya:
* Omba ufikiaji wa data yako (inayojulikana kama "ombi la ufikiaji wa mada"). Hii hukuwezesha kupokea nakala ya data yako na kuangalia kama tunaichakata kihalali.
* Omba marekebisho ya data yako. Hii hukuwezesha kutuuliza kusahihisha taarifa yoyote isiyo kamili au isiyo sahihi tunayoshikilia kukuhusu.
* Omba kufutwa kwa data yako. Hii hukuwezesha kutuomba kufuta au kuondoa data yako chini ya hali fulani, kwa mfano, ikiwa unaona kuwa hakuna sababu nzuri ya sisi kuendelea kuichakata. Pia una haki ya kutuomba kufuta au kuondoa data yako ambapo umetumia haki yako ya kupinga kuchakatwa (tazama hapa chini).
* Inapinga kuchakata data yako ambapo tunategemea maslahi yetu halali (au yale ya wahusika wengine) na kuna kitu kuhusu hali yako mahususi ambacho kinakufanya utake kukataa kuchakatwa kwa msingi huu.
* Omba kizuizi cha usindikaji wa data yako. Hii hukuwezesha kutuuliza tuahirishe uchakataji wa data yako, kwa mfano ikiwa unataka tubainishe usahihi wake au sababu ya kuichakata.
* Omba uhamishaji wa data yako kwa chama kingine.

SourceText: Depending on the circumstances and the nature of your request it may not be possible for us to do what you have asked, for example, where there is a statutory or contractual requirement for us to process your data and it would not be possible to fulfil our legal obligations if we were to stop. Further information on your rights is available from the Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO).
text: Kulingana na mazingira na aina ya ombi lako huenda isiwezekane kwetu kufanya ulichoomba, kwa mfano, pale ambapo kuna mahitaji ya kisheria au ya kimkataba ili sisi kuchakata data yako na haingewezekana kutimiza wajibu wetu. majukumu ya kisheria ikiwa tungeacha. Taarifa zaidi kuhusu haki zako zinapatikana kutoka Ofisi ya Kamishna wa Habari (ICO).

SourceText: ICO
text: ICO

SourceText: 8. Removing the app
text: 8. Kuondoa programu tumishi

SourceText: We are sorry if you find our app no longer useful. Should you decide to remove our app, we may still retain some of your data (although anonymised) to troubleshoot, aid in investigations, comply with legal requirements or to add to our existing research data sets.
text: Samahani ikiwa unaona programu tumishi yetu haina maana tena. Iwapo utaamua kuondoa programu tumishi yetu, bado tunaweza kuhifadhi baadhi ya data yako (ingawa hatujulikani) ili kutatua matatizo, kusaidia uchunguzi, kutii mahitaji ya kisheria au kuongeza kwenye seti zetu zilizopo za data za utafiti.

SourceText: 9. Changes to the @global.privacy_policy
text: 9. Mabadiliko ya @global.privacy_policy
note: The string @global.privacy_policy should not be translated.

SourceText: We may update our @global.privacy_policy from time to time. You waive your right to be notified directly of changes and are advised to review this page periodically for any updates. Your continued use of the app suggests you agree to subsequent revisions of the @global.privacy_policy.
text: Tunaweza kuboresha @global.privacy_policy mara kwa mara. Unaachilia haki yako ya kuarifiwa moja kwa moja kuhusu mabadiliko na unashauriwa kukagua ukurasa huu mara kwa mara kwa masasisho yoyote. Kuendelea kwako kutumia programu kunapendekeza ukubali masahihisho yajayo ya sera ya @global.privacy_policy.

SourceText: If you have any questions or suggestions about our @global.privacy_policy, do not hesitate to contact us at apps@idems.international.
text: Ikiwa una maswali au mapendekezo kuhusu @global.privacy_policy, usisite kuwasiliana nasi kwa apps@idems.international.
note: The string @global.privacy_policy should not be translated.

SourceText: This @global.privacy_policy page was based on a draft created at @local.link_10_1_text and modified/generated by @local.link_10_2_text.
text: Ukurasa huu wa @global.privacy_policy ulitokana na rasimu iliyoundwa katika maandishi ya @local.link_10_1_ na kurekebishwa/kutolewa na @local.link_10_2_text.

SourceText: 1. User Agreement
text: 1. Mkataba wa Mtumiaji

SourceText: These @global.terms_and_conditions are an agreement between you and @global.app_id (‘@global.app_name’ or ‘the app’) which furthermore sets out the rules for your use of @global.app_name.
text: Haya @global.terms_and_conditions ni makubaliano kati yako na global.app_id (‘@global.app_name’ au ‘programu’) ambayo zaidi ya hayo yanaweka sheria za matumizi yako ya @global.app_name.

SourceText: @global.app_name is a free app designed to provide parents and caregivers with simple and useful messages regarding water, sanitation and hygiene practices for the home.
text: @global.app_name ni programu tumishi isiyolipishwa iliyoundwa ili kuwapa wazazi na walezi ujumbe rahisi na muhimu kuhusu maji, usafi wa mazingira na kanuni za usafi nyumbani.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.app_name is brought to you by the collaboration of partners including INNODEMS, IDEMS International, University of Oxford, University of Cape Town, National Institute for Medical Research - Mwanza Centre Tanzania, and Clowns Without Borders South Africa (‘the @global.app_name team’).
text: @global.app_name inaletwa kwako na ushirikiano wa washirika wakiwemo Chuo Kikuu cha Oxford, IDEMS International, Chuo Kikuu cha Cape Town, Taasisi ya Kitaifa ya Utafiti wa Matibabu - Kituo cha Mwanza Tanzania, na Clowns Without Borders Afrika Kusini ('the @global.app_name team ').

SourceText: Please read these @global.terms_and_conditions carefully. By downloading or using the app, you agree that you have read, understood, and accepted the @global.terms_and_conditions contained below.
text: Tafadhali soma haya @global.terms_and_conditions kwa makini. Kwa kupakua au kutumia programu, unakubali kwamba umesoma, umeelewa, na umekubali @global.terms_and_conditions zilizo hapa chini.

SourceText: Your privacy is important to us – please also read our @global.privacy_policy, which will detail how we collect, store and use the information that you provide to us. By using @global.app_name you are confirming to us that you are further agreeing to our @global.privacy_policy, as set out separately.
text: Usiri wako ni muhimu kwetu - tafadhali soma pia sera yetu ya @global.privacy_policy, ambayo itaeleza kwa undani jinsi tunavyokusanya, kuhifadhi na kutumia taarifa ambayo unatupatia. Kwa kutumia @global.app_name unatuthibitishia kuwa unakubali zaidi sera yetu ya @global.privacy_policy, kama ilivyowekwa kando.

SourceText: 2. Rules of Usage
text: 2. Kanuni za Matumizi

SourceText: @global.app_name is open source and therefore its source code is available on GitHub for the usage and adaptation by the wider software community.  Nevertheless, you are not allowed to modify the existing app as is or its contents or copy any @global.app_name team trademarks.  Whilst open source, you should not translate the app into other languages or make derivative versions without acknowledging the @global.app_name team in your efforts.  Attempts to obtain sensitive account information or other personal data is not permitted.  You should also not falsely represent yourself in the use of the app, make wrongful claims of affiliations to the app or make misleading reports of app misconduct.   Use of the app must not also be in breach of any applicable laws or regulations.
text: @global.app_name ni chanzo huria na kwa hivyo msimbo wake wa chanzo unapatikana kwenye GitHub kwa matumizi na urekebishaji na jumuiya pana ya programu tumishi. Hata hivyo, huruhusiwi kurekebisha programu iliyopo kama ilivyo au yaliyomo au kunakili alama za biashara za timu ya @global.app_name. Ingawa ni chanzo huria, hupaswi kutafsiri programu katika lugha nyingine au kutengeneza matoleo mengine bila kutambua timu ya @global.app_name katika juhudi zako. Majaribio ya kupata maelezo nyeti ya akaunti au taarifa nyingine ya binafsi hairuhusiwi. Pia hupaswi kujiwakilisha kwa uwongo katika matumizi ya programu, kutoa madai yasiyo sahihi ya ushirika na programu au kutoa ripoti za kupotosha za utovu wa nidhamu wa programu. Matumizi ya programu haipaswi pia kukiuka sheria au kanuni zozote zinazotumika.

SourceText: Finally this app is not targeted towards anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from individuals under 18.  In the case we discover that an individual under 18 has provided us with personal information (such as gender / name or nickname), we will immediately delete this data from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to undertake the necessary actions.
text: Programu tumishi hii haijalengwa kwa mtu yeyote aliye na umri wa chini ya miaka 18. Hatukusanyi taarifa zinazoweza kumtambulisha mtu binafsi kutoka kwa watu walio chini ya umri wa miaka 18 kwa makusudi. Iwapo tutagundua kuwa mtu aliye na umri wa chini ya miaka 18 ametupa taarifa za binafsi(kama vile jinsia/ jina au jina la utani), tutafuta taarifa hii mara moja kutoka kwa kanzidata zetu. Ikiwa wewe ni mzazi au mlezi na unafahamu kwamba mtoto wako ametupa taarifa binafsi, tafadhali wasiliana nasi ili tuweze kuchukua hatua zinazohitajika.

text:
Tafadhali fahamu kuwa timu ya @global.app_name haiwajibiki kwa majukumu kwa yafuatayo:


a. Baadhi ya utendakazi wa programu utahitaji programu kuwa na muunganisho wa intaneti. Timu ya @global.app_name haiwezi kuwajibika kwa programu kutofanya kazi kikamilifu ikiwa huna ufikiaji wa Wi-Fi, au huna salio lolote la bando la data.

Kwa hivyo, unaweza kutozwa na mtoa huduma wako wa simu kwa gharama ya data kwa muda wa muunganisho unapotumia programu, au gharama zingine za watu wengine. Katika kutumia programu, unakubali kuwajibika kwa gharama zozote kama hizo, ikiwa ni pamoja na gharama za data ya kutumia mitandao ya ng'ambo ikiwa unatumia programu nje ya eneo lako la nyumbani (yaani, eneo au nchi) bila kuzima utumiaji wa data nje ya mtandao wako. Ikiwa wewe si mlipaji wa bili wa kifaa ambacho unatumia programu, tafadhali fahamu kwamba tunadhania kuwa umepokea ruhusa kutoka kwa mlipaji wa bili kwa kutumia programu.

d. Unapaswa kutumia busara na uamuzi wako kila wakati kulingana na hali yako kuhusiana na ushauri au taarifa yoyote iliyotolewa kutoka kwa programu.

Programu inapatikana kwenye Android - mahitaji ya mfumo huu (na kwa mifumo yoyote ya ziada tunayoamua kupanua upatikanaji wa programu) inaweza kubadilika. g. Tovuti ya programu inaweza kuwa haipatikani kila wakati kwa sababu za matengenezo au changamoto inayohusiana na programu au vifaa husika. i. Makampuni au bidhaa zinazohusishwa na programu hazipaswi kutafsiriwa kama uidhinishaji na programu au timu ya @global.app_name au kuonyesha nia ya kukiuka haki za umiliki.

SourceText: Last updated: 1 March 2023
text: Mara ya mwisho imeboreshwa: tarehe 1 mwezi wa tatu 2023

SourceText: Why do we need to be clean?
text: Kwa nini tunahitaji kuwa wasafi?

SourceText: Clean bodies keep us healthy and free from disease. Be sure to wash your face and all your other body parts with soap. You will feel great after!
text: Miili safi hutufanya tuwe na afya njema na tusiwe na magonjwa. Hakikisha unaosha uso wako na sehemu zako zote za mwili kwa sabuni. Utajisikia vizuri baada ya hapo!

SourceText: Importance of bathing and washing
text: Umuhimu wa kuoga na kuosha

SourceText: It is important to use clean water to wash our bodies and faces so we don't get diseases like trachoma (which can lead to blindness).
text: Ni muhimu kutumia maji safi kuosha miili na nyuso zetu ili tusipate magonjwa kama trakoma (ambayo yanaweza kusababisha upofu).

SourceText: Tips for a clean bathroom
text: Vidokezo vya bafu safi

SourceText:
* Sweep your bathroom, the area around it and pathway to it daily.
* Use soap to get rid of any stains on the floor if you can.
* Check your bathroom regularly. Make any repairs quickly.
text:
* Fagia bafu lako, njia yake, no eneo linaloizunguka kila siku.
* Tumia sabuni kuondoa madoa yoyote kwenye sakafu kama ukiweza.
* Angalia bafu lako mara kwa mara. Fanya matengenezo yoyote haraka.

SourceText: Well done
text: Umefanya vizuri

SourceText: CONGRATULATIONS!  You have done it!  You have built important skills in WASH.  This is a huge achievement.  Let’s celebrate you, and the steps you are taking to ensure your home is healthy and strong.
text: HONGERA SANA! Umefanikisha hilo! Umejenga ujuzi muhimu katika WASH. Haya ni mafanikio makubwa. Hebu tukusherehekee, kwa hatua unazochukua ili kuhakikisha kuwa nyumba yako ina afya na ni imara.

SourceText: What makes a toilet safe?
text: Nini hufanya choo kuwa salama?

SourceText: A safe toilet is one that is clean, separates you from your stool and urine, and is well-ventilated. Regular cleaning will also keep away nasty smells and flies.
text: Choo salama ni kile ambacho ni kisafi, kinachokutenganisha na kinyesi na mkojo wako, na chenye hewa ya kutosha. Kusafisha mara kwa mara pia kutaepuka harufu mbaya na nzi

SourceText: Importance of clean and safe toilets
text: Umuhimu wa vyoo safi na salama

SourceText: Keeping your toilet clean keeps germs away and stops the spread of disease. Besides, you don't want to be stepping on stool or urine while you are using the toilet. You can do it! Keep it clean for you and your neighbours.
text: Kuweka choo chako kikiwa safi huzuia vijidudu mbali na kuzuia kuenea kwa magonjwa. Mbali na hilo, hutaki kukanyaga kinyesi au mkojo wakati unatumia choo. Unaweza kufanya hivyo! Iwe safi kwako na kwa majirani zako.

SourceText: Why using a toilet is important
text: Kwa nini kutumia choo ni muhimu

SourceText: Open defecation, or pooping outside of a toilet, can feel safer, cleaner, or more convenient. However, the flies that land on human poop surely land on your ugali, too. It is important that you use a toilet.
text: Kujisaidia wazi, au kujisaidia nje ya choo, kunaweza kuhisi salama zaidi, safi zaidi, au inafaa zaidi. Hata hivyo, nzi wanaotua kwenye kinyesi cha binadamu hakika hutua kwenye ugali wako pia. Ni muhimu kutumia choo.

SourceText: Tips for a clean toilet
text: Vidokezo vya choo safi

SourceText:
* Sweep your toilet, the area around it and pathway to it daily.
* Use soap to get rid of any urine stains or stool.
* Throw used toilet paper into the toilet.
* Check your toilet regularly. Make any repairs quickly.
text:
* Fagia choo chako, eneo linalokizunguka na njia yake kila siku.
* Tumia sabuni kuondoa madoa ya mkojo au kinyesi.
* Tupa karatasi ya tishu iliyotumika kwenye choo.
* Angalia choo chako mara kwa mara. Fanya marekebosho yoyote haraka.

SourceText: Why do we wash hands?
text: Kwa nini sisi tunanawa mikono?

SourceText: Washing your hands with soap is one of the cheapest and most effective things you can do to protect yourself from getting ill. Handwashing with soap stops germs, which cause illness like diarrhoea and COVID, from passing from person to person or to your food and water.
text: Kunawa mikono kwa sabuni ni mojawapo ya jambo rahisi na yenye ufanisi zaidi unaloweza kufanya ili kujikinga na maradhi. Kunawa mikono kwa sabuni huzuia vijidudu, vinavyosababisha magonjwa kama kuhara na COVID 19, kutoka kwa mtu kwenda kwa mwingine au kwenye chakula na maji yako.

SourceText: Why is soap important?
text: Kwa nini sabuni ni muhimu?

SourceText: Washing your hands with just water is not enough to remove all the dirt and stool from your hands after you have been to the toilet or changed a nappy. Even if your hands look clean you can still have poop germs on them, especially if you haven't washed your hands with soap. These germs spread when you touch your face, nose, or mouth.
text: Kunawa mikono kwa maji tu haitoshi kuondoa uchafu na kinyesi kutoka kwa mikono yako baada ya kutoka chooni au kubadilisha nepi. Hata kama mikono yako inaonekana safi bado unaweza kuwa na vijidudu vya kinyesi juu yake, haswa ikiwa hujanawa mikono yako kwa sabuni. Viini hivi huenea unapogusa uso, pua au mdomo wako.

SourceText: What do you need?
text: Je, unahitaji nini?

SourceText: Washing your hands is easy. All you need is a container of clean water (or a tap), a basin, and some soap. Soap should be kept near a handwashing station. If the station is outside, keep soap near the door so it can be easily accessed, but kept safe.
text: Kuosha mikono yako ni rahisi. Unachohitaji ni chombo cha maji safi (au bomba), beseni, na sabuni. Sabuni inapaswa kuwekwa karibu na kituo cha kunawia mikono. Ikiwa kituo kiko nje, weka sabuni karibu na mlango ili iweze kufikiwa kwa urahisi, lakini iwekwe salama.

SourceText: How to keep healthy
text: Jinsi ya kuwa na afya

SourceText:
You can stay healthy by drinking safe water, using clean toilets, and washing your hands often.

Not doing this can lead to diarrhoea, undernutrition, and other diseases involving worms or bugs.
text:
Unaweza kuwa na afya bora kwa kunywa maji salama, kutumia vyoo safi, na kunawa mikono mara kwa mara.

Kutofanya hivi kunaweza kusababisha kuhara, utapiamlo, na magonjwa mengine yanayohusisha minyoo au wadudu.

SourceText: Diarrhoea
text: Kuhara

SourceText:
Diarrhoea is when you have three or more loose or liquid stools per day. It is often a sign that your body has a bug (a bacterial, viral, or parasitic infection).

Diarrhoea can be prevented but can be serious, especially when the body loses a lot of water.

Remember to wash your hands often and practise safe food and clean water habits.
text:
Kuhara ni wakati una kinyesi kilicho na maji mara tatu au zaidi kwa siku. Mara nyingi ni ishara kwamba mwili wako una mdudu (bakteria, virusi, au maambukizi ya vimelea).

Kuhara kunaweza kuzuiwa lakini kunaweza kusababisha madhara, haswa wakati mwili unapoteza maji mengi.

Kumbuka kunawa mikono mara kwa mara na kuwa na mazoea ya kula chakula salama na kunywa maji safi.

SourceText: Avoiding worms in your water
text: Kuzuia minyoo katika maji yako

SourceText:
Tiny, invisible worms can cause a disease known as bilharzia or schistosomiasis. They lead to abdominal pain, rash, diarrhoea, and blood in your stool. People become infected when coming into contact with infected water.

Stop the spread of the disease by drinking and bathing in clean water and don't contaminate the water sources by defecating in open areas or in the lake.
text:
Minyoo wadogo wasioonekana wanaweza kusababisha ugonjwa unaojulikana kama bilharzia au kichocho. Husababisha maumivu ya tumbo, upele, kuhara, na damu kwenye kinyesi chako. Watu huambukizwa wanapogusana na maji yaliyoambukizwa.

Zuia kusambaa kwa ugonjwa kwa kunywa na kuoga maji safi na usichafue vyanzo vya maji kwa kujisaidia maeneo ya wazi au katika ziwa.

SourceText: Avoiding worms in your compound
text: Kuzuia minyoo katika mazingira yako

SourceText:
Worms that break down food for compost are helpful. Other worms, like hookworm, roundworm, and whipworm, are tiny and invisible and dangerous. They can lead to malnutrition, diarrhoea, and stomach pain, among other symptoms.

Eggs of these worms are found in human stool, which can land in soil and transfer to your feet and hands.

Regularly cleaning your compound and toilet, disposing of children’s stool in the toilets, and regular handwashing are important to prevent infections.
text:
Minyoo inayosaidia kumeng'enya chakula ni muhimu. Minyoo mingine, kama vile safura, ni wadogo na hawaonekani, na ni hatari. Wanaweza kusababisha utapiamlo, kuhara, na maumivu ya tumbo, kati ya dalili zingine.

Mayai ya minyoo inapatikana katika kinyesi cha binadamu, ambayo inaweza kufikia ardhi na kuhamia katika miguu na mikono yako.

Kusafisha mara kwa mara kiwanja chako na choo, kutupa kinyesi cha watoto kwenye vyoo, na unawaji mikono mara kwa mara ni muhimu ili kuzuia maambukizi.

SourceText: Preventing blindness
text: Kuzuia  upofu

SourceText:
Trachoma is a disease of the eye that can cause blindness. It is passed when a fly, hand, or cloth carrying the bacteria touches an eye. Flies are best controlled with a clean home.

Face washing is the best way to prevent Trachoma. Make sure that the face washing cloth, when used, is clean.

Handwashing, cleaning toilets and homes, as well as regular cleanliness stops the spread of Trachoma.
text:
Trakoma ni ugonjwa wa macho ambao unaweza kusababisha upofu. Hupitishwa wakati nzi, mkono, au kitambaa kilichobeba bakteria kinagusa jicho. Nzi hudhibitiwa vyema kwa nyumba kuwa safi.

Kuosha uso ndiyo njia bora ya kuzuia Trakoma. Hakikisha kwamba kitambaa cha kunawia uso kinapotumiwa ni safi.

Kunawa mikono, kusafisha vyoo na nyumba, pamoja na usafi wa kawaida huzuia kuenea kwa Trakoma.

SourceText: See your doctor
text: Muone daktari wako

SourceText: If you feel unwell it is important to visit a health facility. They can help!
text: Kama unajisikia vibaya ni muhimu kutembelea kituo cha afya. Wanaweza kusaidia!

SourceText: What is a clean house?
text: Nyumba safi ni Nini?

SourceText: Keeping our house and the area around it clean, will keep us healthy. We should all have safe places to live free of litter, as well as human and animal waste.
text: Kuweka nyumba yetu na eneo linaloizunguka safi, kutatufanya tuwe na afya njema. Sote tunapaswa kuwa na maeneo salama ya kuishi bila takataka, pamoja na taka za binadamu na wanyama.

SourceText: How do you keep your house clean?
text: Je, unaiwekaje nyumba yako safi?

SourceText:
Make sure you clean your compound regularly. Children’s stool should be thrown in the toilet, and animal waste and litter removed.

Use water and detergent to clean the floor and walls where you can.
text:
Hakikisha unasafisha kiwanja chako mara kwa mara. Kinyesi cha watoto kinapaswa kutupwa chooni, na taka za wanyama na takataka kwa ujumla ziondolewe.

Tumia maji na sabuni kusafisha sakafu na kuta unapoweza.

SourceText: More tips to keeping a clean home!
text: Vidokezo zaidi vya kuweka kaya safi!

SourceText:
* Get rid of pests in your house by sweeping, washing and drying up damp places regularly.
* Protect food and throw garbage in a covered pit - flies like garbage!
*Mosquitoes like to live in still water, such as in open containers and puddles. Cover or empty any still water in your home to keep mosquitoes away.
text:
* Ondoa wadudu nyumbani mwako kwa kufagia, kuosha na kukausha sehemu zenye unyevu mara kwa mara.
* Funika chakula na kutupa taka kwenye shimo lililofunikwa - nzi wanapenda takataka!
*Mbu hupenda kuishi kwenye maji tulivu kama vile kwenye vyombo vilivyo wazi na madimbwi. Funika au mwaga maji yoyote tulivu nyumbani kwako ili kuzuia mbu.

SourceText: Set up a handwashing station at home
text: Tengeneza sehemu ya kunawia mikono nyumbani

SourceText: A handwashing station is a place where you can wash your hands at home. All you need is a container of water (or a tap), a basin, and some soap. The station makes handwashing easy after tasks like using the toilet, changing a nappy, or working in the garden.
text: Sehemu ya kunawa mikono ni mahali ambapo unaweza kunawa mikono nyumbani. Unachohitaji ni chombo cha maji (au bomba), beseni, na sabuni. Kituo hurahisisha unawaji mikono baada ya kazi kama vile kutumia choo, kubadilisha nepi, au kufanya kazi bustanini.

SourceText: How to wash hands
text: Jinsi ya kunawa mikono

SourceText:
Step 1: Wet your hands with clean water.
Step 2: Use enough soap to cover your hands.
Step 3: Scrub all surfaces of your hands – such as the back of hands, between fingers and under nails. You should scrub for at least 20 seconds.
Step 4: Rinse well with clean water.
Step 5: Dry your hands with a clean cloth or towel.
text:
Hatua ya 1: Lowesha mikono yako kwa maji safi.
Hatua ya 2: Paka sabuni ya kutosha kwenye mikono yako.
Hatua ya 3: Sugua sehemu zote za mikono yako - kama vile sehemu ya nyuma ya mikono, kati ya vidole na chini ya kucha. Unapaswa kusugua kwa angalau sekunde 20.
Hatua ya 4: Osha vizuri kwa maji safi.
Hatua ya 5: Kausha mikono yako kwa kitambaa safi au taulo.

SourceText:
WASH means Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene. Good WASH practises, like using safe water and food, ensuring clean toilets and homes, and handwashing, keep us healthy. 

* Hand washing prevents the spread of diseases.
* Drinking safe clean water prevents illnesses, like diarrhoea. 
* Access to clean toilets helps to keep germs away.
text:
WASH ina maana ya Maji, Usafi wa Mazingira, na Usafi kwa jumla. Mazoea mazuri ya WASH, kama vile kutumia maji na chakula salama, kuhakikisha vyoo na nyumba safi, na unawaji mikono, hutuweka tukiwa na afya njema.

* Kunawa mikono huzuia kuenea kwa magonjwa.
* Kunywa maji safi na salama huzuia magonjwa kama vile kuhara.
* Uwepo wa vyoo safi huzuia vijidudu.

SourceText: Water, Sanitation and Hygiene
text: Maji Salama, Usafi na Usafi kwa ujumla

SourceText: Safe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene (WASH) helps us and keeps our communities safe from harmful germs.
text: Maji Salama, Usafi wa Mazingira na Usafi kwa ujumla (WASH) hutusaidia na kuweka jamii zetu salama dhidi ya vijidudu hatari.

SourceText: Handwashing with soap
text: Kunawa mikono na sabuni

SourceText: Washing your hands with soap is one of the most important things you can do to keep strong and healthy.
text: Kunawa mikono yako na sabuni ni moja ya vitu muhimu sana unavyoweza kufanya kujiweka imara na mwenye afya.

SourceText: When to wash your hands
text: Ni wakati gani wa kunawa mikono yako

SourceText: To avoid the spread of germs it is important to wash your hands with soap several times a day.
text: Ili kuepuka kuenea kwa vijidudu ni muhimu kuosha mikono yako na sabuni mara kadhaa kwa siku.

SourceText: How to wash your hands
text: Jinsi ya kunawa mikono yako

SourceText: Washing your hands is easy! Just follow these simple steps.
text: Kunawa mikono yako ni rahisi! Fuata tu hatua hizi rahisi.

SourceText: Keeping healthy
text: Kujiweka mwenye afya

SourceText: Prevent diseases by drinking safe water, using clean toilets and washing your hands often.
text: Zuia magonjwa kwa kunywa maji salama, kutumia vyoo safi na kunawa mikono mara kwa mara.

SourceText: Clean toilets
text: Safisha vyoo

SourceText: A clean toilet means good hygiene.  A dirty one can mean disease.
text: Choo safi inamaanisha usafi mzuri. Choo kichafu kinaweza kumaanisha ugonjwa.

SourceText: Healthy home
text: Kaya salama

SourceText: A safe place to live is possible when your home and its surroundings are clean.
text: Mahali salama pa kuishi panawezekana wakati nyumba yako na mazingira yake ni safi.

SourceText: Safe drinking water
text: Maji salama ya kunywa

SourceText: Clean water saves money and improves health. Collect water from a safe source, maintain clean containers, and treat water to make it clean.
text: Maji safi huokoa pesa na kuboresha afya. Kusanya maji kutoka kwenye chanzo salama, weka vyombo safi na kutibu maji ili kuyafanya kuwa safi.

SourceText: Safe food
text: Chakula salama

SourceText: There are five ways to keep food safe. Know what they are!
text: Kuna njia tano za kuweka chakula salama. Zijue ni zipi!

SourceText: Garbage management
text: Kudhibiti uchafu

SourceText: Let's manage our garbage.  It will mean a clean home.
text: Wacha tudhibiti takataka zetu. Itamaanisha nyumba safi.

SourceText: Bathing and washing
text: Kuoga na kufua

SourceText: Wash often in a clean private bathing place (sometimes, you can even sing while bathing!).
text: Mara zote, oga katika sehemu yako ya kibinafsi safi (wakati mwingine, unaweza hata kuimba wakati wa kuoga!).

SourceText: Celebration
text: Kusherekea

SourceText: Celebrate everything that you have learned.
text: Sherehekea kila kitu ulichojifunza.

SourceText: General WASH (including Waste as well as Bathing and Washing topics)
text: WASH kwa ujumla (pamoja na Taka vilevile mada za Kuoga na Kuosha)

SourceText: Handwashing
text: kuosha mikono

SourceText: Safe water source tips
text: Vidokezo vya vyanzo vya maji salama

SourceText: You can get water from many sources. The safest water is often from a tap. Water from unprotected streams, open sources (such as the lake), and open dug wells is not safe. That water may have bugs (parasites) or stool from animals and or humans that can make us sick.
text: Unaweza kupata maji kutoka kwenye vyanzo vingi. Maji salama zaidi mara nyingi hutoka kwenye bomba. Maji kutoka kwa mito isiyolindwa, vyanzo vya wazi (kama vile ziwa), na visima vilivyochimbwa si salama. Maji hayo yanaweza kuwa na vijidudu (vimelea) au kinyesi kutoka kwa wanyama na wanadamu ambacho kinaweza kutufanya wagonjwa.

SourceText: Transporting and storing water
text: Kusafirisha na kutunza maji

SourceText: Make sure that water that is carried and stored does not come into contact with hands, dirt or insects. Hands, dirt, and insects make water unsafe to drink.
text: Hakikisha kwamba maji yaliyobebwa na kuhifadhiwa hayagusani na mikono, uchafu au wadudu. Mikono, uchafu na wadudu hufanya maji kutokuwa salama kwa kunywa.

SourceText: Using a water container
text: Kutumia chombo cha kutunzia maji

SourceText:
Water should be carried in clean and closed water containers.

There are many designs for water containers. A safe water storage container is one that is:

* Strong and has a tightly fitting lid or cover
* Stable base so it does not tip over
* Durable so that it does not leak easily
* Has a comfortable handle
* And of course, is easy to clean
text:
Maji yanapaswa kubebwa kwenye vyombo safi na vilivyofungwa.

Kuna miundo mingi ya vyombo vya maji. Chombo cha kuhifadhi maji salama ni kile ambacho:

* Kina nguvu na kina mfuniko au kifuniko kinachobana sana
* Msingi thabiti ili isianguke
* Kinadumu ili kisivuje kwa urahisi
* Kina mshikio mzuri
* Na bila shaka, ni rahisi kusafisha

SourceText: How do you keep your container clean?
text: Je, unawekaje chombo chako cha kutunzia maji safi?

SourceText:
Step 1: Wash your hands following the steps in the how to wash your hands module.
Step 2: Pour clean and soapy water into the container.
Step 3: Put on the lid and shake for one minute (or if you can, scrub the inside of the container).
Step 4: Pour the soapy water out. Rinsing next with non soapy water.
Also, don't forget to wash your cup after every use.
text:
Hatua ya 1: Nawa mikono yako kwa kufuata hatua za kipindi cha jinsi ya kunawa mikono yako.
Hatua ya 2: Mimina maji safi na yenye sabuni kwenye chombo.
Hatua ya 3: Funika chombo na utikise kwa dakika moja (au ukiweza, sugua ndani ya chombo).
Hatua ya 4: Mimina maji ya sabuni nje. Kisha suuza kwa maji yasiyo na sabuni.
Pia, usisahau kuosha kikombe chako baada ya kila matumizi.

SourceText: Treating water by boiling
text: Kutibu maji kwa kuchemsha

SourceText:
*  Boiling water can make it safe to drink or cook with.
*  Let the water sit for some time until the dirt settles at the bottom. 
*  Pour it into a pot and boil it for at least 10 minutes to make sure all the germs are killed before using it. 
*  Drink the water within 24 hours. This helps to keep it clean, fresh, and free from other germs.
text:
* Kuchemsha maji kunayafanya yawe salama kwa kunywa au kupikia.
* Acha maji yakae kwa muda hadi uchafu utulie chini.
* Mimina kwenye chungu na chemsha kwa angalau dakika 10 ili kuhakikisha vijidudu vyote vimeuawa kabla ya kuyatumia.
* Kunywa maji ndani ya masaa 24. Hii husaidia kuyaweka safi, salama, na yasiyo na vijidudu vingine.

SourceText: The five ways to keeping your food safe
text: Njia tano za kuweka chakula chako salama

SourceText:
People become infected with intestinal worms by eating unsafe food.

Diseases such as typhoid fever (bacteria infection) can also happen by eating unsafe food or water.

There are five ways to keeping your food safe:
* Keep clean.
* Separate raw and cooked food.
* Cook food thoroughly.
* Keep food at a safe temperature.
* Use safe water.
text:
Watu huambukizwa minyoo ya utumbo kwa kula chakula kisicho salama.

Magonjwa kama vile homa ya matumbo (maambukizi ya bakteria) yanaweza pia kutokea kwa kula chakula kisicho salama au kunywa maji yasiyo salama.

Kuna njia tano za kuweka chakula chako salama:
* Weka safi.
* Tenganisha chakula kibichi na kilichopikwa.
* Pika chakula kiive vizuri.
* Weka chakula katika joto linalostahili.
*Tumia maji salama.

SourceText: Keep clean
text: Weka safi

SourceText:
* Wash your hands with soap before touching food and while cooking.
* Wash your hands after going to the toilet.
* Clean your cooking space and tools.
* Keep bugs, pests, and other animals away from the cooking area.
* Cover food if you can.
text:
* Nawa mikono yako kwa sabuni kabla ya kugusa chakula na unapopika.
* Nawa mikono yako baada ya kutoka chooni.
* Safisha sehemu yako ya kupikia na vifaa.
* Weka wadudu wote na wanyama wengine mbali na mahali pa kupikia.
* Funika chakula kama ukiweza.

SourceText: Small pathogens that cause disease can transfer from your unwashed hands, chopping boards, cloths, and utensils.  Keep these clean.
text: Vijidudu vidogo vinanyoweza kusababisha magonjwa vinaweza kusambaa kutoka katika mikono yako ambayo haijasafishwa, ubao wa kukatia vyakula, nguo, na vyombo. Viweke safi.

SourceText: Separate raw and cooked
text: Tenganisha chakula kibichi na kilichopikwa

SourceText:
* Wash your knife and chopping board after cutting raw meat, chicken, or fish, before you use them for cutting other foods.
* Store food in covered containers when you can. This will keep it safe from pests, moisture, rot, and also stop the mixing of raw and prepared foods.
* Clean up any leftover ingredients when done, especially raw meat.
text:
* Osha kisu chako na ubao wako wa kukatia vyakula baada ya kukata nyama mbichi, kuku au samaki kabla ya kuvitumia kukata vyakula vingine.
* Hifadhi chakula katika vyombo vilivyofunikwa kama unaweza. Hii itakiweka salama dhidi ya wadudu, unyevu, kuoza, na pia kuacha kuchanganya vyakula vibichi na vilivyotayarishwa.
* Safisha viungo vyovyote vilivyosalia ukimaliza, hasa nyama mbichi.

SourceText: Germs causing illness can be found in raw food (such as meat, chicken, and seafood). These can be transferred to other foods during food preparation or storage.  Separating raw and cooked food is therefore important.
text: Vijidudu vinavyosababisha magonjwa vinaweza kupatikana katika vyakula vibichi (kama nyama, kuku, na vyakula vya baharini). Hivi vinaweza kusambaa kwa vyakula vingine wakati wa maandalizi ya chakula au kuhifadhi. Hivyo, kutenganisha chakula kibichi na kilichopikwa ni muhimu.

SourceText: Cook thoroughly
text: Pika chakula mpaka kiive

SourceText:
* Cook food thoroughly, especially meat, chicken, eggs, and seafood. 
* When making stews, remember to bring them to a boil.
* Reheat cooked food thoroughly.
* Boil the water you use to make baby foods and drinks.
text:
* Pika chakula vizuri, hasa nyama, kuku, mayai, na vyakula vya baharini. 
* Unapopika kitoweo, kumbuka kuviacha vichemke.
* Pasha moto tena chakula kilichoiva vizuri.
* Chemsha maji unayotumia kupikia vyakula na kutengenezea vinywaji vya watoto.

SourceText: Cooking with very high heat kills almost all dangerous germs causing illness.  Let's make sure that cooked food is heated thoroughly.
text: Kupika kwa moto mkali inauwa karibia vimelea hatari vyote vinavyosababisha magonjwa. Tuhakikishe kuwa chakula kilichopikwa kinapashwa vyema.

SourceText: Keep food at a safe temperature
text: Tunza chakula katika joto linalostahili

SourceText:
* Leaving cooked food out for longer than two hours can be unsafe.
* Keep cooked food really hot before eating.
text:
* Kuacha chakula kilichopikwa kwa muda mrefu zaidi ya saa mbili kunaweza kuwa hatari.
* Weka chakula kilichopikwa kiwe  cha moto sana kabla ya kula.

SourceText: When food is stored at room temperature germs can grow.  That's why it's important to heat food well and eat it soon after cooking.
text: Chakula kikihifadhiwa kwenye chumba chenye joto, vijidudu vya magonjwa vinaweza kukuwa. Ndio maana ni muhimu kupika chakula na moto mkali na kula mara baada ya kupika.

SourceText: Use safe water
text: Tumia maji salama

SourceText:
* Use safe water (see our modules on safe drinking water for more tips). Even though your water might look clean, it's still important to treat or boil it.
* Remember to wash your fruits and vegetables with safe water.
text:
* Tumia maji salama (tazama vipindi vyetu vya maji salama ya kunywa kwa vidokezo zaidi). Ingawa maji yako yanaweza kuonekana kuwa safi, bado ni muhimu kuyatibu au kuyachemsha.
* Kumbuka kuosha matunda na mboga zako kwa maji salama.

SourceText: Why?
text: Kwanini?

SourceText: Your vegetables, fruits, meats, and even water can hold dangerous germs that cause illness. Washing with safe water and peeling raw foods decreases your risk of getting sick.
text: Mboga zako, matunda, nyama, na hata maji vinawezakuwa na vimelea hatari vinavyoweza kusababisha magonjwa. Kuosha kwa maji salama na kumenya matunda kunapunguza hatari ya kupata magonjwa.

SourceText: What is solid garbage?
text: Takataka ngumu ni nini?

SourceText:
Solid garbage can be everything from:
* Paper garbage (paper bags)
* Organic materials (food)
* Plastic garbage (bottles)
text:
Takataka ngumu inajumuisha:
* Takataka za karatasi (mifuko ya karatasi)
* Nyenzo-hai (chakula)
* Takataka za plastiki (chupa)

SourceText: Why should we manage our garbage?
text: Kwa nini tudhibiti takataka zetu?

SourceText:
* Reduce breeding grounds for germs, bugs, rodents, mosquitos, snakes, and other animals which can spread diseases.
* Protect the environment and clean water sources.
* Garbage can block drains and cause flooding.
* Rotting garbage leads to a bad smell, which causes discomfort.
* It really isn't nice to look at!
text:
* Kupunguza mazalia ya vijidudu, kunguni, panya, mbu, nyoka na wanyama wengine ambao wanaweza kueneza magonjwa.
* Kulinda mazingira na vyanzo vya maji safi.
* Takataka zinaweza kuzuia mifereji ya maji na kusababisha mafuriko.
* Takataka zinazooza husababisha harufu mbaya, ambayo husababisha usumbufu.
* Kwa kweli sio nzuri kutazama!

SourceText: How to manage solid garbage
text: Jinsi ya kudhibiti taka ngumu

SourceText:
The disposal/treatment of solid garbage depends on the type and amount of garbage made. Here’s how to manage your garbage: To throw your garbage:
* Paper garbage can be buried or collected.
* Organic materials can be composted, for instance in household compost pits, and can be used as fertilisers/soil conditioners for trees and plants around your home.
* Plastic garbage can be collected and buried or recycled.
* And remember, do not place your solid garbage in the toilet.
text:
Utupaji/utunzaji wa taka ngumu hutegemea aina na kiasi cha takataka zilizotengenezwa. Hivi ndivyo jinsi ya kudhibiti uchafu wako. Jinsi ya kutupa takataka yako ni kama ifuatavyo:
* Takataka za karatasi zinaweza kuzikwa au kukusanywa.
* Taka zinazoweza kuoza zinaweza kuwekwa kama mbolea, kwa mfano katika mashimo ya mbolea nyumbani, na inaweza kutumika kama mbolea/kutunza unyevu wa udongo kwa miti na mimea karibu na nyumba yako.
* Taka za plastiki zinaweza kukusanywa na kufukiwa au kutumika tena.
* Kumbuka, usiweke takataka yako ngumu kwenye choo.

SourceText: Ways to reduce the amount of garbage we make
text: Njia za kupunguza kiasi cha takataka tunazotengeneza

SourceText:
* Carry your own bag to the shops to avoid using a new plastic bag.
* Use reusable containers, like plastic bottles, rather than buying new ones.
* Try to fix or repair things when they break.
text:
* Beba mfuko wako mwenyewe hadi dukani ili kuepuka kutumia mfuko mpya wa plastiki.
* Tumia vyombo vinavyoweza kutumika tena, kama vile chupa za plastiki, badala ya kununua vipya.
* Jaribu kutengeneza au kurekebisha vitu vinapovunjika.

SourceText: When do we wash hands?
text: Je, ni wakati gani wa kunawa mikono?

SourceText:
To help keep healthy it is very important to wash your hands with soap at the following times:
* Before and after cooking
* Before eating
* Before and after attending a sick person
* After using the toilet
* After changing a baby’s nappy
text:
Ili kusaidia kuweka afya ni muhimu sana kunawa mikono kwa sabuni nyakati zifuatazo:
* Kabla na baada ya kupika
* Kabla na baada ya kula
* Kabla na baada ya kuhudumia mtu mgonjwa
* Baada ya kutumia choo
* Baada ya kubadilisha nepi ya mtoto

SourceText: Washing your hands with soap feels good
text: Kuosha mikono yako kwa sabuni ni vizuri

SourceText: When you wash your hands with soap, your hands will feel and smell clean and fresh.
text: Unapoosha mikono yako kwa sabuni, mikono yako itakuwa safi nakunukia vizuri.

SourceText: Cleaning after changing nappies
text: Kusafisha baada ya kubadilisha nepi

SourceText: Baby poop looks and smells different from adult poop, but it can still make you sick. It's important to wash your hands after cleaning a baby's nappy.
text: Kinyesi cha watoto kinaonekana na harufu tofauti na kinyesi cha watu wazima, lakini bado kinaweza kukufanya mgonjwa. Ni muhimu kuosha mikono yako baada ya kusafisha nepi ya mtoto.

SourceText:
By providing your consent below you acknowledge reading and accepting the @global.terms_and_conditions and @global.privacy_policy. The most important commitments are:
1. This is, and will always be, a fully free app.
2. Your data will never be sold. We are not for profit.
3. By using the app you are helping to make the app better for you and others.
4. Your anonymised data may be used for research purposes by our @global.parent_app team.
text:
Kwa kutoa ridhaa yako hapa chini unakubali kusoma na kukubali @global.terms_and_conditions na @global.privacy_policy. Mambo muhimu ya kukubaliana nayo:
1. Hii ni, na itakuwa programu inayopatikana bure.
2. Taarifa zako kamwe hazitouzwa. Sisi hatupo kwa faida ya kifedha.
3. Kwa kutumia programu unasaidia kuiboresha programu kwa ajili yako na wengine.

By clicking in the button below you will reset the app to its initial settings. 

This means that all your progress and usage data will be deleted and your app will work as if it was just installed for the first time.

NOTE: Resetting the app is permanent and you will not be able to recover any information.

SourceText:
Keep healthy and feel good after learning more about safe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene (WASH).

@global.app_name is here to support you.

Here is how to use the app:
text:
Kuwa na afya njema na kujisikia vizuri baada ya kujifunza zaidi kuhusu Maji salama, Usafi wa Mazingira na Usafi kwa ujumla (WASH).

@global.app_name ipo hapa kukusaidia.

Hivi ndivyo jinsi ya kutumia programu:
note:
The string

@global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: This big button takes you to the module we encourage you to explore.
text: Kitufe hiki kikubwa kinakupeleka kwenye kipindi tunachokuhimiza kuangalia.

SourceText: Here you can select any of the other modules in @global.app_name. Each module gives you simple tips and information about WASH. Swipe to see the next modules.
text: Hapa unaweza kuchagua vipindi vingine vyovyote katika @global.app_name. Kila kipindi hukupa vidokezo rahisi na habari kuhusu WASH. Peruzi ili kuona vipindi vinavyofuata.
note: The string @global.app_name. should not be translated.

SourceText: You can explore any module whenever you want. To build your knowledge and skills in WASH, access all of the content in one module before moving to the next one.
text: Unaweza kuchunguza vipindi vyovyote wakati wowote unapotaka. Ili kujenga maarifa na ujuzi wako katika WASH, pata maudhui yote katika sehemu moja kabla ya kuhamia nyingine.
